reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major bronchial conditions: acute bronchitis (~3000-5000), chronic bronchitis (~500-1000), asthma with bronchial involvement (~2000-3000), bronchiectasis (~50-100), bronchospasm (~500+). Estimated total ~8500 per 100k. Low confidence due to heterogeneity, overlapping definitions, and variable severity across subcategories.
